author: pquerna
msg: Return the status from reading the bucket, rather than aborting. Fixes Issue 52.

author: pquerna
msg: Always initialize ssl_ctx->pending_err correctly, fixing an uinit read.

author: pquerna
msg: If process_connection has failed, remember this next time event trigger is called, as we could still have events waiting in the pollset, and calling into process_connection a second time with a dead connection can cause double cleanup problems.

author: pquerna
msg: Fix aggregate bucket make to set the init hold open correctly.

author: pquerna
msg: Return EAGAIN by default, rather than SUCCESS.
